New Records: Tommy Edman set his season high with 4 runs batted in.
Tommy Edman set his career high with 4 runs batted in.
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani recorded his 47th homer and 48th stolen base of the season in the Dodgers' comeback 10-8 win over the Cubs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers needed to win by 2 runs or more to cover the spread.
The over/under was 9 and the teams scored 18 runs.
The Dodgers won at -165 odds so a bet of $165 won $265 total.
Others: Bellinger's HR not enough as Dodgers beat Cubs
